name: Krog (Ryan Miller)
description:
Krog is a casual dungeon crawling fantasy RPG (role-playing game) that follows our hero into a mysterious castle in search of his kidnapped mate. Explore a strange castle, home to industrious creatures, an army of Censor mages, and a growing corruption. Play as Krog and chomp your enemies in this fun and casual adventure.

Note: Krog was originally released in 2012 for PC, Mac, iOS and Android. The PC version is still playable, though other platforms have become incompatible due to recent OS requirements (64-bit binaries, Graphics library changes, etc). I'm exploring options to restore compatibility & finish the main story of Krog - leave a comment if you're interested!
